name: Bubble Toast
plugin_instructions:
1. Navigate to the "Workflow" tab in your bubble.io project.

2. Click on "Add an Event" to choose the trigger that will activate the toast notification.

3. After selecting the desired event, click on "Add an Action" to specify what should happen when the event occurs.

4. In the action options, locate and select "Toast" from the available actions under "Plugins" or simply type "Toast" in the search box.

5. Once you've chosen "Toast," customize the content, appearance, and behavior of the toast notification according to your preferences.

6. Optionally, set the background color, text color, and position of the toast notification to match your application's design.
